summary: Effective oversight of offshore oil and gas development is critical to preventing another Deepwater Horizon-type disaster. However, the Department of the Interior's Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement has struggled to successfully implement key initiatives to improve offshore oversight. For example, a risk-based facility inspection initiative was halted due to concerns about its usefulness and unclear protocols. This and other difficulties are largely due to...
title: Offshore Oil and Gas Oversight: Actions Needed to Address Leadership Commitment Deficiencies at Interior
